## Biography
Hello! I am a senior at the University of Kansas studying Behavioral Neuroscience with a certificate in data science graduating in the winter of 2025. My research interests include the role of emotions and affect regulation in core ADHD/ASD symptoms pertaining to social situations and interpersonal relationships.

## Semesters

- Spring 2025, *Research Assistant*
